alert.note: Alert for Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 2:30PM EDT until June 03 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of Greenville Downtown, or near Reidville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Five Forks, Woodruff, Roebuck, Reidville, Moore, Croft State Park, Pauline, Cross Anchor, Enoree and Pacolet. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
